import React from "react"; import * as Yup from "yup"; import { Formik, Form, Field, ErrorMessage } from "formik"; import { FormGroup, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; const StudentForm = (props) => { const validationSchema = Yup.object().shape({ title: Yup.string().required("Wymagane"), author: Yup.string().required("Wymagane"), genre: Yup.string().required("Wymagane"), kind: Yup.string().required("Wymagane"), }); console.log(props); return (






); }; export default StudentForm;
